## KeyModifier.merge() method

Merge another KeyModifier into this one.

**Signature:**

```typescript
merge(newMod: KeyModifier, options?: {
        allowOverwrite?: boolean;
    }): this;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newMod | [KeyModifier](./zotero-plugin-toolkit.keymodifier.md) | the new KeyModifier |
|  options | { allowOverwrite?: boolean; } | _(Optional)_ |

this
